audioText: Si tu perds ce manuscrit médiéval, le musée ne pourra jamais le remplacer.
question: What happens if the medieval manuscript is lost?
options: The museum will never be able to replace it
The museum will order a new copy from the publisher
The museum will digitize other similar manuscripts
The museum will close the medieval exhibition
explanation: The text states 'Si tu perds ce manuscrit médiéval, le musée ne pourra jamais le remplacer' - If you lose this medieval manuscript, the museum will never be able to replace it. 'Perds' is the second person singular form of 'perdre' (to lose).
